attributes.action: Remove entitlement to benefits from people identified as being involved in riots
attributes.additional_details: Remove all entitlement to financial benefits from those identified as being involved with rioting, wanton large-scale vandalism, terrorising communities and large-scale public disorder of the type likely to cause injury, threat to life and livelihood and unacceptable risks to the emergency services. Remind the nation that we have responsibilities to go with our rights and failure to heed those responsibilities may result in removal of said rights
